width.description: The width of the image display

description.description: A description, which will be displayed at the bottom, and if the alt has no value, it will be set to the alt
description.description_zh: 描述，将显示在底部，如果 alt 没有值，则会将其设置给 alt

fit.description: Determine how the image fits into the container box
fit.description_zh: 确定图片如何适应容器框

alt.description: A textual description of the image

hide-footer.description: Whether to hide footer (version 2.36.0 supports the 'never' parameter to show the bottom content when loading errors)
hide-footer.description_zh: 是否隐藏 footer（2.36.0 版本支持 'never' 参数，支持在加载错误时显示底部内容）

footer-position.description: The location shown at the bottom

show-loader.description: Whether or not to display the loading effect

v-model:preview-visible.description: Controls the open state of the preview, which can be used with previewVisibleChange
v-model:preview-visible.description_zh: 控制预览的打开状态，可与 previewVisibleChange 配合使用

default-preview-visible.description: The default open state for previews

:preview-props.description: Preview the config item (all options are optional) ImagePreviewProps
:preview-props.description_zh: 预览的配置项（所有选项都是可选的） ImagePreviewProps

footer-class.description: The class name of the region is displayed at the bottom

events.name: preview-visible-change
events.description: Preview the opening and closing events
events.description_zh: 预览的打开和关闭事件

slots.name: error-icon
slots.description: 自定义错误状态的图标
slots.description_zh: 自定义错误状态的图标
